channel.title: Wisconsin Governor Re-election
channel.description:
http://news.yahoo.com/eyes-wisconsin-governors-recall-election-050318428.html
Thoughts? Should Americans be able to ask for a reelection when the man has been in office for a year and a half?
Do you think what the Governor has done for Wisconsin is good or bad?

item.title: Wisconsin Governor Re-election
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:13, topic:444143”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=546826.msg4009608#msg4009608 date=1339026037]

dissolving unions != helping the people

Dissolving the unions in Wisconsin is bad for Wisconsin and the people in it?
[/quote]
Taking power away from workers is bad.[/quote]

So is taking power away from employers.

Read full topic

item.title: Wisconsin Governor Re-election
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:8, topic:444143”][quote author=t4 link=topic=546826.msg4008922#msg4008922 date=1338942426]

politicians should be cycled out as often as possible, but not too often to prohibit progress.

Do you think Scott Walker has been progressing or should he be cycled out.

i don’t know of his policies or achievements, therefore i don’t have an opinion at this time
[/quote]LOL you literally just sounded like a politician with that remark <3[/quote]
unlike a lot of people on this forum, i try not to judge before i divulge.

Read full topic

item.title: Wisconsin Governor Re-election
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

Acorn_:

Obama 2013!

I have a feeling Obama may win his re-election.

item.title: Wisconsin Governor Re-election
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:7, topic:444143”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=546826.msg4009176#msg4009176 date=1338985392]

cbsnews.com

Scott Walker wins Wisconsin recall election

Republican Gov. Scott Walker holds onto his job, beating back Democratic challenger Tom Barrett after record-breaking battle

The population wants him.
[/quote]

the population wanted hitler when he rose to power and couldn’t do a damn thing about it when they didn’t want him any longer

politicians shouldn’t be able to stay in power, allowing them to stay in power means they’ll do anything for the vote and to stay in power rather than helping the people, see putin and russia

also re:scott walker, wasn’t he the assholes who wouldn’t allow the unions a few years back?[/quote]

I wouldn’t say he is an asshole, but yes, he dissolved (all?) unions, cut back government spending, etc.

One can argue that he is helping the people and the big unions want him out because they are losing money.

Read full topic
